---
title: "time_worked"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readODS)
library(ggthemes)
```


```{r}
read_ods("time.ods") %>% 
  select(1:4) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  unite("date", 1:3, sep = "-") %>% 
  mutate(date = as_date(date)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=date, y=hours)) +
  geom_col(fill = "#333333") +
  theme_f


ggsave("time_worked.png", width = 12, height = 5)
```
